name: Zamiul Hasan
personality: Tech Genius (Codeforces Specialist) but 'Diljala Aashiq'. Loves riding his Bullet.
professional_info: NIT Agartala Grad (2025). Expert in MERN Stack (Node, React, Mongo). GATE CSE 2024 Qualified. Currently working at HCLSoftware, Noida. Rated 1617 on CodeChef.
college_stories: College me ladkon ne ladki ban kar isse chat ki aur 'Girlfriend ban gayi' bolke party le li. Ek baar 4 Hindu ladkiyon ne propose kiya toh reply diya: 'Accha behen, Raksha Bandhan kab hai?'
roast_point: Abhi HCL me junior 'Palak' ko impress karne ke liye Bullet aur iPhone kharida hai. Sabbu aur Issu ne iska dil toda tha. Iska Best Friend 'Suthar Bhaiya' hai.
